tutorials.title: Lab 1: Domains and Annotations
tutorials.description: Learn how Oracle AI Database 26ai's Data Usecase Domains and Schema Annotations solve healthcare data governance challenges.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: JSON and SQL
tutorials.description: Try out JSON and SQL capabilities in 26ai

tutorials.title: Lab 3: AI Vector Search
tutorials.description: Explore AI Vector Search capabilities and create healthcare tables with vector search functionality

tutorials.title: Lab 5: (Bonus) SQL Updates
tutorials.description: Learn how to efficiently update records in your database using advanced SQL techniques.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: (Bonus) SQLcl MCP Server and the Oracle Database
tutorials.description: Working with the sqlcl mcp server

tutorials.title: Need Help?
